problem_text_cn: 如图,AB、AC切⊙O于B、C,DE切⊙O于F,DE交AB于点D,交AC于点E,连接DO,EO,若∠A=40°,则∠DOE的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are tangent to ⊙O at B and C, DE is tangent to ⊙O at F, DE intersects AB at point D and intersects AC at point E, connect DO and EO, if ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠DOE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OA、OB、OC；∵AB、DE分别是⊙O的切线,∴OB⊥AB,OF⊥DE；在RT△ODB与RT△ODF中,\begin{cases}OB=OF\\OD=OD\end{cases},∴△ODB≌△ODF(HL),∴∠DOB=∠DOF；同理可证:∠FOE=∠COE,∴∠DOE=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC；∵∠A+∠BOC=360°-90°-90°=180°,∴∠BOC=180°-40°=140°,∴∠DOE=70°．故选:C．
